title: Jean Bayard
text: Jean Bayard (23 October 1897 in <a href="Toulouse">Toulouse</a> – 11 March 1995) was a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who competed in the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a>. In 1924 he won the silver medal as member of the French team.
